caption: Metadata
description: The Metadata object describes the metadata associated with the class.
name: metadata

uid.caption: Class UID
uid.description: The logging system-assigned unique identifier of an class instance.

version.description: The version of the OASF schema, using Semantic Versioning Specification (SemVer). For example: 1.0.0. Consumers use the version to determine the available class attributes.
